get.description: Retrieve a list of all costs.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default: 1)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter costs by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter costs by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: cost_type_name
parameters.description: Filter costs by related cost type name

get.description: Retrieve a specific cost by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the cost to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the cost to update

delete.description: Delete a specific cost by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the cost to delete

get.description: Retrieve statistics for daily costs for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve cost statistics, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

error.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

get.description: Retrieve statistics for monthly costs for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve cost statistics, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

error.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

get.description: Retrieve statistics for quarterly costs for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve cost statistics, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

error.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

get.description: Retrieve statistics for yearly costs for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve cost statistics, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

error.example: An error occurred while processing your request.
